resources.string: Key Mapper должен использовать службу спец. возможностей для возможности определения нажатия кнопок и выполнения заданных вами действий. Служба спец. возможностей используется только для определения нажатия кнопок и определения используемого приложения. Вы можете проверить это в исходный код, ссылка на который находится на странице \"О программе\".
¯\\_(ツ)_/¯\n\nВы не выбрали никаких действий для этого ярлыка!
Приложение будет работать, но некоторые настройки могут потребовать исправления в зависимости от того, что вы выберите в дальнейшем.
Ваше устройство не поддерживает некоторые действия.

Внимание!!! Эти координаты корректны только если ваш экран в той же ориентации как на скриншоте! Это действие отменит любые касания или жесты которые вы делаете на экране.\n\nЕсли вам нужна помощь в определении координат курсора на экране - сделайте скриншот и затем нажмите на область скриншота где вы будет действие нажатия.
выполните действия Key Mapper которые требуют клавиатуру
Получите новую Key Mapper наэкранную клавиатуру!
Зажмите до тех пор пока событие…
Нажмите кнопку на устройстве, которое вы хотите ввести. \n\nВАЖНО! Ввод кода этой кнопки в качестве действия будет работать только если вы используете совместимую с Key Mapper клавиатуру.
ВАЖНО! Ввод кода этой кнопки в качестве действия будет работать только если вы используете совместимую с Key Mapper клавиатуру.
Введите текст, который вы хотите вставить при выполнении этого действия.
Введите URL, который вы хотите открыть. http://, https:// или www. не требуется.
Не удалось найти сопряженные устройства. Включен ли Bluetooth?
После того, как вы добавили администратора устройства, вы должны удалить его, если вы хотите удалить приложение.
Долгое нажатие на громкость вниз • USB клавиатура

Помогла ли страница решить вашу проблему? Какое ваше устройство?

 Какой OEM оболочка или ROM вы используете?

 Пожалуйста, опишите проблему:
Разрешение скриншота не соответствует разрешению этого устройства!
UUID карта клавиши скопирована в буфер обмена
Страница настроек специальных возможностей не найдена
Вы уверены, что хотите уйти без сохранения?
Убедитесь, что Bluetooth включен и у вас есть сопряженные устройства, а затем повторите попытку.

Когда вы нажмете \"OK\", откроются настройки В настройках, прокрутите вниз и нажмите «Включить Root права», чтобы вы могли использовать функции/действия root. Если вы знаете, что ваш телефон не имеет прав Суперпользователя или вы не знаете, что это такое, то вы не сможете использовать функции, которые работают только на устройствах с правами суперпользователя.
Просьба описать в письме проблему, с которой вы столкнулись. В противном случае я не могу вам помочь. Спасибо!
Длительное нажатие работает только для кнопок громкости и навигации. Если вы включите его для других клавиш, клавиши не будут работать, если они не будут длительно нажаты.

To grant Key Mapper WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission, enable \"root features\" in the settings if your device is rooted. If your device isn\'t rooted, follow the guide on how to use a PC/Mac to grant permission.

To grant Key Mapper WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission, enable \"root features\" in the settings if your device is rooted. If your device isn\'t rooted, go to the Help page and follow the guide on how to use a PC/Mac to grant permission.

Your device doesn\'t seem to have an accessibility services settings page. You can enable the accessibility service by giving the app WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. After you tap \'okay\' a popup will guide you how to do it.
"Multiple keys can't be double pressed at the same time."
The keys need to be listed from top to bottom in the order that they will be held down.

A \"sequence\" trigger has a timeout unlike parallel triggers. This means after you press the first key, you will have a set amount of time to input the rest of the keys in the trigger. All the keys that you have added to the trigger won\'t do their usual action until the timeout has been reached. You can change this timeout in the \"Options\" tab.

Please check out the FAQ to see if your question has already been answered. If not, then the developer would prefer it if you ask for help and suggest features in the Discord server. If you don\'t have Discord, you can email the developer directly.

Android doesn\'t allow apps to get a list of connected (not paired) Bluetooth devices. Apps can only detect when they are connected and disconnected. So if your Bluetooth device is already connected to your device when the accessibility service starts, you will have to reconnect it for the app to know it is connected.
Change location or turn off automatic back up?

Screen on/off constraints will only work if you have turned on the \"detect trigger when screen is off\" key map option. This option will only show for some keys (e.g volume buttons) and if you are rooted. See a list of supported keys on the Help page.

If you have any other screen lock chosen, such as PIN or Pattern then you don\'t have to worry. But if you have a Password screen lock you will *NOT* be able to unlock your phone if you use the Key Mapper Basic Input Method because it doesn\'t have a GUI. You can grant Key Mapper WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission so it can show a notification to switch to and from the keyboard. There is a guide on how to do this if you tap the question mark at the bottom of the screen.
Select the input method for actions that require one. You can change this later by tapping \"Select keyboard for actions\" in the bottom menu of the home screen.

You need to choose the \"Caps Lock to camera\" keyboard layout for your keyboard otherwise the Caps Lock key will still lock caps. You can find this setting in your device settings -> Languages and Input -> Physical Keyboard -> Tap on your keyboard -> Set Up Keyboard Layouts. This will remap the Caps Lock key to KEYCODE_CAMERA so Key Mapper can remap it properly.\n\nAfter you\'ve done this you must remove the Caps Lock trigger key and record the Caps Lock key again. It should say \"Camera\" instead of \"Caps Lock\" if you did the steps correctly.
Where do you want to get the new keyboard?

Reboot your device if the \"Record trigger\" button is counting down and the buttons that you are pressing aren\'t showing up. If your buttons are still not showing up after rebooting then Key Mapper doesn\'t support your buttons. There isn\'t a fix for this.
You can only have duplicates of the same key from the same device in a sequence trigger if they all have the same click type (short/long/double press).
Нажмите, чтобы приостановить ваши карты ключей.
Нажмите, чтобы запустить службу специальных возможностей.
Нажмите, чтобы снова начать отображать клавиатуру.
Нажмите, чтобы переключиться на и с клавиатуры Key Mapper.
Переопределить жесты отпечатков пальцев с помощью Key Mapper!
Ваше устройство поддерживает переопределение жестов по датчику отпечатков пальцев. Нажмите, чтобы начать переопределение!
How long a button should be pressed for it to be detected as a long press. Default is 500ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
How fast does a button have to be double pressed for it to be detected as a double press. Default is 300ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
How long to vibrate if vibrating is enabled for a key map. Default is 200ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
How long a key map needs to be held down for the action to start repeating. Default is 400ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
The delay between every time an action is repeated. Default is 50ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
The time allowed to complete a sequence trigger. Default is 1000ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
Force all key maps to vibrate.
Show a persistent notification to allow you to pick a keyboard.
Show a persistent notification which starts/pauses your key maps and has a link to start/stop the accessibility service.
Automatically back up key maps to a specified location
When a Bluetooth device you have chosen connects or disconnects, the keyboard picker will show automatically. Choose the devices below.
Automatically change the keyboard on Bluetooth connection

The Key Mapper keyboard will be automatically selected when a chosen bluetooth device is connected. Your old keyboard will be automatically selected when the device disconnects. There may be a 5-10 second delay after disconnecting your device for the keyboard to change.

Enable this if you want to use features/actions which only work on rooted devices. Key Mapper must have root permission from your root-access-management app (e.g Magisk, SuperSU) for these features to work. Only turn this on if you know your device is rooted and you have given Key Mapper root permission.
Switch between the Key Mapper keyboard and your default keyboard when you tap the notification.
Automatically change the keyboard when toggling key maps
Automatically select the Key Mapper keyboard when you resume your key maps and select your default keyboard when pausing them.
Hide the alerts at the top of the home screen.
Show the first 5 characters of the device id for device specific triggers
This is useful to differentiate between devices that have the same name.
These options will only work on root devices! If you don\'t know what root is or whether your device is rooted, please don\'t leave a poor review if they don\'t work. :)
These options are only enabled if Key Mapper has WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. Click the relevant Fix button at the top of the home screen for instructions.
Show a toast message when performing
Vibrate when keys are initially pressed and again when long pressed.
Detect trigger when screen is off. ROOT only.
Your key maps will only work once you have enabled the accessibility service. It also needs to be turned on to create a trigger.
You can only record a trigger if the accessibility service is enabled.

There is no guarantee that every action will work on your device and that every button can be detected. This is because there are many flavours of Android, and OEMs can break features by accident or intentionally. If something doesn\'t work, please notify the developer and refrain from giving the app a poor rating since the issue is often out of the developer\'s control. =)
Key Mapper may stop working randomly!

CRITICAL!!! Tap \"turn off\" to prevent Android from stopping the app while it is in the background. Your OEM\'s skin such as MIUI or Samsung Experience may have other \"battery saving\" features so it is STRONGLY recommended to turn them off for Key Mapper as well by going to dontkillmyapp.com
Stock Android battery optimisation is off. This is not good enough for most devices so go to dontkillmyapp.com for tutorials which show how to turn off even more app-killing features on your device.
Go to Don\'t Kill My App
Your device seems to support Samsung Dex

Samsung doesn\'t allow apps with a 3rd party keyboard to open while in Dex mode. Therefore, this app won\'t open and the Key Mapper keyboard won\'t work while you are in Dex mode. Your key maps which don\'t require the Key Mapper keyboard will still work while you\'re in Dex mode.
Key Mapper needs Do Not Disturb access if you want actions which change the volume and remapped volume buttons to work.

"This app is open source! You can start contributing by heading over to the sds100/KeyMapper repo on GitHub and by joining the Discord server. Even if you can't code, you can contribute by helping others and testing the latest features."
Tap the 3 dots to change the repeat behaviour and more. You can test an action and fix action errors by tapping it.

This option will only work if your device is rooted and you have told Key Mapper that it has root permission in the Key Mapper settings. If you don\'t know what root is then this option will not work. It will also only work for some keys (e.g volume buttons) so see the Help page for a list of supported keys.
You can remap fingerprint reader gestures! :)
You can not remap fingerprint reader gestures!
You\'ll need to enable the accessibility service so that Key Mapper can check whether your device can detect fingerprint gestures.
Your device can detect fingerprint gestures! There is a tab at the top of the home screen for remapping fingerprint gestures.

Your device does not allow 3rd party apps to detect fingerprint gestures! There isn\'t anything the developer can do about this. Some devices have the setting to swipe down on the fingerprint reader to open the notification drawer and do not allow 3rd party apps to detect fingerprint gestures.
Key Mapper accessibility service is disabled
Key Mapper keyboard service is disabled
You must have at least one trigger
The shortcut must have a title!
You must be using one of the Key Mapper keyboards for this action to work!
Can\'t find the shortcut. Is the app installed or enabled?
The app with package name %s isn\'t installed!
You need to grant Key Mapper permission to modify system settings to use this action.
This is only supported up to Android %s
Can\'t find the keyboard settings page!
Key Mapper needs to be a device administrator to use this action!
Key Mapper doesn\'t have permission to use that shortcut.
The app needs permission to change the Do Not Disturb state!
This action needs permission to read the phone state!
Can\'t find the WRITE_SETTINGS permission page!
No compatible app is found to send feedback.
If you are remapping a volume button you need to give the app Do Not Disturb access if you want the buttons to work while in Do Not Disturb mode!
Permission to change Do Not Disturb mode granted!
Can\'t find the Do Not Disturb access permission settings!
No app can be found to open that URL
Failed to execute \"getevent\" command. Are you sure you\'re rooted?
Maximum number of cameras in use!
The accessibility service must be enabled for this app to work!
The accessibility service needs to be enabled!
Accessibility service needs to be enabled!
Your selected input method needs to be enabled for “Key event”, “Key”, “Text” and some other actions to work.
None of the Key Mapper keyboards are enabled!
A Key Mapper keyboard is enabled!
A Key Mapper keyboard must be enabled and selected for some of your actions to work!
This device has no enabled input methods!
Your key maps won\'t work! Some things need fixing!
You can\'t move to the end of the text in this field!
Battery optimisation settings not found! If it exists, open it manually.
error: Can\'t find a label for this option \"%s\"
This gesture already has this constraint!
Can\'t find the Key Mapper input method!
File isn\'t cached! Connect to internet to download it.
File access denied! Is it deleted?
Failed to back up to file. Is it deleted?
Battery optimisation is turned on! This can randomly stop Key Mapper from working.
Can\'t find the notification access settings!
Denied permission to start phone calls!
Cycle through ringer modes (Ring, Vibrate, Silent)
Pause media playback for an app
Resume media playback for an app
Play/Pause media playback for an app
Not all media apps support fast forwarding. E.g Google Play Music.
Not all media apps support rewinding. E.g Google Play Music.
Go to last app. (Double press recents)

You will only be able to log back in with your PIN. The fingerprint scanner and face unlock will be disabled. This is the only reliable way I have found to lock non-rooted devices before Android Pie 9.0.
You must turn on the option to detect the trigger when the screen is off!
The Key Mapper keyboard must be selected for this action to work and this action may not work as intended in some apps.
This action will only work if you have tapped on an input field where the keyboard is supposed to be shown.
A comma-separated list of \"true\" and \"false\". E.g true,false,true
A valid Integer in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Integers in the Java programming language. E.g 100,399
A comma separated list. E.g category1,category2
A comma separated list of strings. E.g string1,string2
A valid Long in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Longs in the Java programming language. E.g 102302234234234,399083423234429
A valid Byte in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Bytes in the Java programming language. E.g 123,3
A valid Double in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Doubles in the Java programming language. E.g 1.0,3.234
A valid Char in the Java programming language. E.g \'a\' or \'b\'
A comma-separated list of valid Chars in the Java programming language. E.g a,b,c
A valid Float in the Java programming language. E.g 3.145
A comma-separated list of valid Floats in the Java programming language. E.g 1241.123
A valid Short in the Java programming language. E.g 2342
A comma-separated list of valid Shorts in the Java programming language. E.g 3242,12354
Check out the Quick Start Guide if you are stuck.
